content: pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols direct link to pattern pdf 1 calls for japanese size 3/0 crochet hook 2 3 mm **note ** booties pictured on pattern website have a separate pattern listed here 2 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/28ss/oc4 pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/28-oc4-5-baby-shoes
